Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection until SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Total elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to lead to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to the final resolution of the review process (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Reject) in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average waiting time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection until the first reviewer formally agrees (SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Recommendation overdue in delayed review paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to Assign a Different Editor when initial reviewer selection fails
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late in problematic variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted manuscripts that included SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time it takes from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to reach SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation when at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed is recorded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW–Major Revision due in 1 month in cases that proceed through SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'end': "activity == 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 month'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit in resubmission pathways involving SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"
